name: Totally Original Pong
description:
Pong I made in a weekend a long time ago. Decided to post it here since it's kind of done. Ain't touching this anymore.

CONTROLS
  • Navigate menus with mouse
  • WS for left panel
  • Up and down arrow keys for right panel
FEATURES
  • All of the games on the front page work, but some variants do not
  • Hit around a ball at a fixed angle
  • You can go against a bot in a 1v1
  • Speedball works
